amendment.description: To modify notice requirements in advance of permanent reductions of sizeable numbers of members of the Armed Forces at military installations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3290 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Begich. (consideration: CR S7294-7298; text: CR S7297-7298) To modify notice requirements in advance of permanent reductions of sizeable numbers of members of the Armed Forces at military installations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Begich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3290 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
